web.service

Class FormService

  • java.lang.Object
    • web.service.FormService

  • public class FormService
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around HttpSession providing functionality for POST forms. Methods that serve POST requests are here

      FormService()

      • serveLike

        public void serveLike(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                      web.auth.AuthenticationService authService,
                      manager.PostManager postManager)
               throws domain.ValidationException
        Serves users action, reacting to post
        Parameters:
        req - recieved post request
        authService - service for determining login state
        postManager - used for finding the post to react to
        Throws:
        domain.ValidationException - If something goes wrong, propagates message to the user

      • getUserOfProfile

        public domain.User getUserOfProfile(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                    web.auth.AuthenticationService authService,
                                    manager.UserManager userManager)
                             throws domain.ValidationException
        Determines whose profile i am looking at
        Parameters:
        req - recieved post request
        authService - service for determining if i am logged in or not
        userManager - manager for getting the user from model
        Returns:
        User that owns profile i am looking at
        Throws:
        domain.ValidationException - Propagates info about failing to find specified user

      • serveProfileChange

        public void serveProfileChange(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                               domain.User user,
                               manager.UserManager userManager)
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               javax.servlet.ServletException,
                               domain.ValidationException
        Serves changes in profile, only image change is currently supported
        Parameters:
        req - recieved post request
        user - user who wants to change his profile
        userManager - for propagating the profile change to model
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when post request wasnt multipart
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown when post request wasnt multipart
        domain.ValidationException - propagates info to user when something goes wrong

      • validateRegistration

        public void validateRegistration(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                 manager.UserManager userManager)
                          throws domain.ValidationException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 javax.servlet.ServletException
        Validates registration form and throws exception if something is not valid
        Parameters:
        req - recived post request
        resp - for redirecting user if all goes well
        userManager - for checking if user already exists
        Throws:
        domain.ValidationException - propagates info to user
        java.io.IOException - is thrown when something goes wrong with picture
        javax.servlet.ServletException - is thrown when something goes wrong with picture

        Parameters:
        req - recieved post request

        Serves logout request
        Parameters:

        Returns:
